elements.title: medieval gardens (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that much of what we know of medieval gardens comes from illuminated manuscripts (example pictured)?

elements.title: Mark Hutton (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Mark Hutton was the first Australian to be a starting pitcher in a Major League Baseball game?

elements.title: 2018 mayoral race in Malang, Indonesia (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that two of three candidates in the 2018 mayoral race in Malang, Indonesia, were arrested for bribery before the election?

elements.title: Gladys Stone Wright (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Gladys Stone Wright got started with a year of free piano lessons and a $5 clarinet?

elements.title: At the Name of Jesus (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that "At the Name of Jesus" has been described as "the only completely objective theological hymn to come from the hand of a 19th-century woman writer"?

elements.title: Liza Soberano's early acting roles (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Liza Soberano's early acting roles include playing the third wheel in romance films?

elements.title: Maryland Child Victims Act (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Maryland state delegate C. T. Wilson compared negotiating with the Catholic Church on the Maryland Child Victims Act to making "a deal with the devil"?

elements.title: Ștefan Tita (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that educational writer Ștefan Tita gave Romanian students impractical advice on mending damaged bark with bandages of dirt?

elements.title: Houdini (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Eminem promoted "Houdini" with a video in which David Blaine eats a wine glass?
